prompts: Create a dinosaur-like Pokémon with sharp teeth and big wings soaring through the sky.
Show me a flying Pokémon that has a sleek body and can glide effortlessly over mountains.
Imagine a prehistoric creature Pokémon with a fierce expression and vibrant colors ready for battle.
Design a Pokémon that resembles a pterosaur with a long tail and intimidating wingspan.
Generate a rock-type Pokémon that has a unique design, featuring spikes and an adventurous spirit.
Give me a Pokémon that can fly at high speeds and has a streamlined body for agility.
Make a Pokémon that embodies the essence of ancient flying reptiles with striking colors.
